channel.title: Posting Pictures™ + More [Pictures]
channel.description:
[b]Explanation:[/b] [i]IM BORED - Alot of people ask this and i might aswell answer - with extra's[/i]
[b]Requirements:[/b] [i]Internet - I will be explaining with PHOTOBUCKET[/i]
[b]Procedure:[/b] [b]Step 1[/b]
[i]Either sign up on:[/i] www.imageshack.us http://photobucket.com/ [i]Or any other photo hosting [/i]
[b]Step 2[/b] [i] Upload your picture on there and get the [/i] [i]'Url Link'[/i] [img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/imgtag.jpg[/img] On photobucket just click on it once [i]For E.G.[/i] http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/RageScapeComingSoon.jpg
[b]Step 3[/b]
[i]Click the IMG TAG BUTTON[/i] [img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/urllink.jpg[/img] [i]And insert the 'URL LINK' Into it[/i] [i]E.G.[/i] [code][img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/urllink.jpg[/img][/code] [i]Obviously dont code it - and voila! Done![/i] [b] Some cool lettering[/b]
[i]For these you need num lock on and you need to hold the 'alt' button whilst typing the number When you've typed the number release the 'alt' button.[/i]
[img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/ALTCODER.gif[/img]
Post other alt codes if there not on there
[b]THATS IT[/b] [b] Credits : Me©

item.title: Posting Pictures™ + More [Pictures]
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:5, topic:90924”][quote author=jut_is_back link=topic=132627.msg1282546#msg1282546 date=1178587055]
this if for questions not tutorial on how to post pictures…

but uhm thanks anyways u just taught the younger ones how to “post” pictures
[/quote]

This is for questions, exactly, he’s/she’s answering one some members might have. So keep it shut. This is related to the forum and it’s an answer, so where else should he/she post this? And for all you know, a CM wouldn’t know how to use Photobucket. Don’t judge someone by their status/rep.[/quote]

True

Read full topic

item.title: Posting Pictures™ + More [Pictures]
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

Explanation: IM BORED - Alot of people ask this and i might aswell answer - with extra’s

Requirements: Internet - I will be explaining with PHOTOBUCKET

Procedure:
Step 1

Either sign up on:
www.imageshack.us

Photobucket

Photobucket - Photo and image hosting, free photo galleries, photo editing.

Get free image hosting, easy photo sharing, and photo editing. Upload pictures and videos, create with the online photo editor, or browse a photo gallery or album and create custom print products.


Or any other photo hosting

Step 2

Upload your picture on there and get the
‘Url Link’

On photobucket just click on it once
For E.G.
http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/RageScapeComingSoon.jpg

Step 3

Click the IMG TAG BUTTON

And insert the ‘URL LINK’ Into it
E.G.

[img]http://i178.photobucket.com/albums/w263/Owner_Killah/urllink.jpg[/img]

Obviously dont code it - and voila! Done!

Some cool lettering

For these you need num lock on and you need to hold the ‘alt’ button whilst typing the number
When you’ve typed the number release the ‘alt’ button.

Post other alt codes if there not on there

THATS IT
[b]
Credits : Me©

Read full topic
